abstract: The year-end stock market rally has vanished.
snippet: The year-end stock market rally has vanished.
lead_paragraph: The last two days of 2008 saw the Dow Jones industrials gain 3.45 percent. It was, Dow Jones promptly announced, the third best end-of-year rally ever for the index. The best one, Dow added ominously, came in 1929, when the index leaped 4.22 percent over the final two sessions, rising from 240.66 to 248.48.
